InfluenceRule.name: Kind people more likely to JW2BF
Col people less likely to JW2BF
Loyal people more likely to JW2BF
Loving people more likely to JW2BF
Sympathetic people more likely to JW2BF
Mean people less likely to JW2BF
Smooth talkers more likely to JW2BF
Forgiving people more likely to JW2BF
More likely to JW2BF w/person you trust
More likely to JW2BF w/person you pity
Less likely to JW2BF w/person you're scared of
Less likely to JW2BF w/person you're angry at
More likely to JW2BF w/a friend
More likely to JW2BF w/high buddy
Less likely to JW2BF w/low buddy
More likely to JW2BF if R has been nice
More likely to JW2BF if R has been romantic
Less likely to JW2BF if R has been romantic to other people
Less likely to JW2BF if R has been mean
Less likely to JW2BF if R has been rude
More likely to agree to JW2BF if honest and low romance
More likely to agree to JW2BF if self-destructive and high romance
More likely to agree to JW2BF if emotional
Less likely to agree to JW2BF if forgiving
Less likely to agree to JW2BF if shallow
More likely to agree to JW2BF if insecure
More likely to agree to JW2BF if feeling bad about
Less likely to agree to JW2BF if feeling good about
Less likely to agree to JW2BF if i has good reputation
More likely to agree to JW2BF if i has bad reputation
Less likely to agree to JW2BF if enemies
More likely to agree to JW2BF if friends
Less likely to agree to JW2BF if low buddy
Less likely to agree to JW2BF if not high buddy
Less likely to agree to JW2BF if high cool
past misunderstandings make the responder more likely to accept

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %i% just wanted to be friends with %r% except without the friends part
%i% broke up with %r% even though %prons(r,he/she)% %pron(r,was/were)% all clingy about it
%i% tried to break up with %r% but %prons(r,he/she)% reminded %pron(i,him/her)% of how perfect %list(i,r,we/they)% were for each other
%r% refused to be friend zoned by %i%
%i% dumped %r% the second the bio final was over
%r% %pron(r,was/were)% more than willing to break up with %i%
%r% refused to break up with %i% out of spite or something

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey there, cutie. What's going on?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh... %r%... we need to talk.
I... uh.... I don't think this is working out.
Maybe we should just be friends.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey there, cutie. What's going on?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh... %r%... we need to talk.
I... uh.... I think maybe we should just be friends.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well of course we should! %random(You can't spell LTR without BFF right?,You're my best friend forever!,You can't have a healthy relationship without a solid friendship at its core!)%
Friends forever! Laters!
Hey there. What's going on?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh... %r%... we need to talk.
I... uh.... I think maybe we should just be friends.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, we aren't really friends now, are we?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, we're dating, but...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: So let's just break up.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Er... okay?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey there. What's going on?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh... %r%... we need to talk.
I... uh.... I think maybe we should just be friends.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %shocked%! But we're dating! Don't you see? We're the perfect couple, %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No, we're not. We're really better off as just friends.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You can't do this to me! We were supposed to be together forever... I love you!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Sorry, babe.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey there. What's going on?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh... %r%... we need to talk.
I... uh.... I think maybe we should just be friends.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %sweetie%. Don't you remember when %toc1%? What happened to that %i%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %gender(i,He's,She's)% still here.
Hi %r%. Uhhh, we need to talk.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'll say.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: The thing is... uh... I think this isn't working out. Maybe we'd be better off just being.... friends?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I get it. This is all about you and %o%, right?

I knew it. Fine, %i%. You go be with your precious %o%. But in like two years when %pron(o,he/she)%'s old and fat and cheating on you with every college %gender(r,frat-boy,cheerleader)% you'll wish you stayed with me!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh... yeah.....

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey there, cutie. What's going on?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%. You know what I love about you?
You are always there.... as a friend.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Aren't I anything more?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just don't think it's meant to be.
But we can still be friends, right?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Of course. Yay.... friends.
Hey there, cutie. What's going on?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just wanted to let you know you are an amazing person. I feel like I really understand you. We should be friends.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Aren't I anything more to you than a friend?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Isn't being friends enough?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No. No it is not. We're meant to be together, %i%, and if you don't see that now, I just have to keep trying to convince you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: We'll talk about this later...

Instantiation.name: Let'sBeFriends! - (SS1 Act-2) All the Wrong Reasons

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look, %r%. It's been real, and it's been fun, but... actually, wait, neither of those are true.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What are you saying, %sweetie%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look, I think we both know I just used you to get a passing grade on that bio final. There was never anything between us. This is over.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: But... but...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Sorry or whatever.

Instantiation.name: Let'sBeFriends! - Arrogant Just Want Friends Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%... I've been doing a lot of thinking and... I don't think this relationship is working out.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Wait. Let me get this straight. *You* are trying to break up with *me*?
First of all, no. And second, are you feeble-minded? This is the best relationship someone like you is ever going to be in. Enjoy it while you got it, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: But... but....

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Take care, sweetheart.

Instantiation.name: Let'sBeFriends! - Angry r is angry Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, maybe we should just like, be friends or something.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ugh, whatever, you're a jerk anyway.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I don't really think I deserve that-

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah you did.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No, I really didn't...

Instantiation.name: Let'sBeFriends! - Angry r is angry Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: So, I was thinking, do you just want to be friends or something?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: We're not breaking up, no.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, I was thinking we should.
Uh, I think I have a say in this...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No, not really. Bye now.
